event.title: LCOY25: Workshop - Decentralized Social Networks in Lüneburg, Germany

body.p: Tobias and Paddy will hold a workshop on getting started with the Fediverse at LCOY25 in Lüneburg. After a brief introduction, apps for the various platforms in the Fediverse will be presented, and then we can discuss and take our first steps in the Fediverse together.

Where: Lüneburg, LCOY25 (University Campus)
When: Saturday, 3 p.m., Gebäude München, Room 204
